test_source_code:
def test_request_scope_raises_exception_when_no_asgi():
    app = Sanic("no_asgi")

    @app.get("/")
    async def get(request):
        return request.scope

    request, response = app.test_client.get("/")
    assert response.status == 500
    with pytest.raises(NotImplementedError):
        _ = request.scope
